The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }

description: vCloud Air is the hybrid cloud built for modern IT.

resources.description: Search for metrics for an instance

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. Required fields are vApp and metricName. Possible metric names are cpu.usage.average, cpu.usagemhz.average, cpu.usage.maximum, mem.usage.average, disk.provisioned.latest, disk.used.latest, disk.read.average, disk.write.average. An example query would be vApp='vm-1xxxxx3e-xxxe-xxx2-xxxd-0xxxxxxx9da1' and metricName='cpu.usage.average'

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. An example query would be vApp='vapp-9xxxx17c-xxx6-xxxc-xxx8xxxxxxxxxxe0a'

resources.description: Search for usage for an instance

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time for the usage query, i.e. - 2016-07-21T11:00:00.000Z

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time for usage query, i.e. - 2016-07-20T10:00:00.000Z

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. The required fields are server and vdc. An example query would be server='3xxxxxxc-xxx6-xxxa-abc9-cfcxxxxxxx36' and vdc='e2xxxxx1-xxxb-xxxf-xxx1-efxxxxxxx4b'

name: vCloud Air
